snippet: Matt Every shot a 62 for a one-stroke lead over five other players midway through the Greenbrier Classic. Phil Mickelson shot a 68 and finished the first two rounds at two over.
abstract: Matt Every takes second-round lead at Greenbrier Classic golf tournament; Phil Mickelson misses the cut.
lead_paragraph: Matt Every shot a 62 for a one-stroke lead over five other players midway through the Greenbrier Classic. Phil Mickelson shot a 68 and finished the first two rounds at two over.

headline.main: Mickelson Misses Cut at Greenbrier; Every Has One-Shot Lead
